VectorIndexTable< VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_RW > Class Template Reference

Convert a map of uint32 -> vector<VALUE_TYPE> to a big array to be used with indeces. More...

Detailed Description

template<class VALUE_TYPE, class VALUE_RW = typename LoaderTypeSelector<VALUE_TYPE>::loaderType>
class VectorIndexTable< VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_RW >

Convert a map of uint32 -> vector<VALUE_TYPE> to a big array to be used with indeces.
